document.full_text: the california n.a.a.c.p. is demanding an apology from an orange county republican official who sent out an e-mail picturing president obama's face on the body of a baby chimpanzee.
document.title: west: california: g.o.p. official draws fire for obama caricature
lines_and_colors: the california n.a.a.c.p. is demanding an apology from an orange county republican official who sent out an e-mail picturing president obama's face on the body of a baby chimpanzee.
